pages.content:
HOW TO PLAY

Bet Mechanism

  • Place your bet and select a risk level: Low, Medium, or High.
  • Higher risk levels offer bigger rewards but increase the chance of encountering fire.

Break Windows & Save Residents

  • Play as Rough and break apartment windows to help residents escape while avoiding fire.
  • Each resident saved earns you a payout, which is instantly added to your balance.
  • If hitting fire, no payout is given. Hitting fire doesn't end your game—it just means you missed out on that reward.

Risk Levels & Fire Chance

Each game round contains 19 windows. Based on the risk level you choose, a set number of windows are randomly assigned as fire windows:

  • Low Risk: 3 Fire Windows / 19 Total
  • Medium Risk: 6 Fire Windows / 19 Total
  • High Risk: 9 Fire Windows / 19 Total

Reset System

  • After 10 windows breaking, the board resets with a new random layout of residents and fire.
  • You can keep playing endlessly—your winnings from saved residents are automatically added to your balance in real time.

Bonus Round

Occasionally, the character will receive a safe box from a rescued resident, triggering a Bonus Round. During this round:

  • Residents offer random multiplier rewards.
  • Catch them to instantly multiply your winnings and boost your balance even more!

Mega Bonus Round

Unlock the Mega Bonus Round by saving all possible residents in a round without hitting any fire. In this special round:

  • You get 4 chances to spin a slot-style mini-game.
  • Align matching symbols horizontally, vertically, or diagonally to earn huge payouts.

HOW TO PLAY

How to Play:

  1. Adjust your bet amount using the – or + button on the betting panel.

    Min Bet: IDR 1000     Max Bet: IDR 2000000
  2. Select a risk level: Low, Medium, or High

    Higher risk levels offer bigger rewards but increase the chance of encountering fire
